reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: The voluntary medical campaign for open heart and catheterization surgery for children

description.narrative: 1- Conducting open heart and catheter surgeries for adults from families with limited income who cannot cover the costs of treatment in Yemeni hospitals. 2. Providing the patients' needs for the operation's medications. 3. Eliminate the suffering of many children with heart disease. 4. Health education for everyone who receives treatment. 5. A subsidy for the Ministry of Health, which suffers from a shortage of cardiologists. 6. Activating the role of volunteers and building their capabilities to volunteer in the fields of humanitarian work.
All 10 surgical procedures were successful, open heart surgeries And 83 interventional cardiac catheters have been successfully installed Total beneficiaries 93.
Catheterization and cardiac surgery for children. Carrying out catheter and surgery operations and providing medical tools. Equipping the operating room, providing analyzes and providing drugs.

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
